location: Solar inverter control area, MaMeeFarm, Thailand
title: solar_power_system_shutdown_due_to_battery_degradation
summary: Manual shutdown of farm electrical system due to battery degradation and warning alert.
description: This data unit documents the manual shutdown of the MaMeeFarm electrical system after an audible warning from the hybrid solar inverter. The warning occurred due to degraded battery capacity, which no longer supports a full 24-hour operational cycle. The system was intentionally powered down to prevent damage and to preserve remaining battery capacity. The farm continues to operate under known energy constraints.

external_reference.note: Inverter display inactive due to shutdown; visible wear indicates long-term usage.
